Title: Prosecutors with Stormcall Javelins
Legend: Prosecutors armed with stormcall javelins are amongst the most daring warriors of the celestial host. Fearlessly, they hurtle forward to meet the enemy, hurling blessed projectiles into their midst before descending to eradicate the survivors.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in a Tempest Lords army

Intro: Each model in a Prosecutors with Stormcall Javelins unit is armed with a Stormcall Javelin and Sigmarite Shield. 1 in every 3 models can replace their Stormcall Javelin with a Stormsurge Trident.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Hammerstrike Force • Vanguard Wing

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Prosecutor-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Stormcall Javelin.

Rules.Name: Dispersed Formation
Rules.Fluff: Prosecutors are trained to fight in a widely dispersed formation.
Rules.Rule: If this unit has 2 to 5 models, it is coherent if each model in the unit is within 3" horizontally of at least 1 other model in the unit instead of 1". If this unit has more than 5 models, it is coherent if each model in the unit is within 3" horizontally of at least 2 other models in the unit instead of 1".

Rules.Name: Heralds Of Righteousness
Rules.Fluff: Prosecutors cross the battlefield in a blur of light.
Rules.Rule: Heralds of Righteousness: You can attempt a charge with this unit if it is within 18" of an enemy unit instead of 12". Roll 3D6 instead of 2D6 when making a charge roll for this unit.
